ygData.subject: Re: Unfair advantage...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Doh, forgot the most important part.  :-)  Chant with a drum should be giving you a slightly bigger str boost than Anthem or Warsong.  So if you can only
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 6 Jul 1999, John Kim wrote:
> On Tue, 6 Jul 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
> >
> > I was probably trying to juggle Selos and Anthem - if you have Anthem is it
> > still worth keeping Chant loaded? Or do you reload for the running?
>
> Anthem and Warsong give you the same str boost. But Anthem
> will not stack with Chant; Warsong will. So if you only need
> one str buff, Anthem is fine. If you need two, you will have
> to go with Warsong and Chant.

Doh, forgot the most important part. :-) Chant with a drum
should be giving you a slightly bigger str boost than Anthem
or Warsong. So if you can only twist two, the prefered two
would be Chant and Accelerando. But if Anthem is enough to
unencumber you, there's no need to swap it out for Chant.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
